title: Bad Bean Baja Grill
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Mexican-fusion restaurant offers two different types of vegetarian burritos and tacos:  rice and beans and grilled tofu (easily made vegan with no cheese or sour cream). Other vegetarian items are salads, quesadillas, a black bean quinoa burger, and a grilled tofu wrap (all of which could be easily made vegan). Fun, low-key atmosphere and great specials throughout the week.
